mapper.select:
select id,title,noticecontent as newscontent from notice
istochart = #{istochart}
and DATASTATUS=3 and CHECKSTATUS=2
order by id desc
select id,title,noticecontent as newscontent from NOTICE where DATASTATUS=3 and CHECKSTATUS=2 order by id desc
